body_html:
@Michael-Jing
I encountered the same issue when compiling the tensorflow-serving 1.7.

ERROR: /home/web_server/.cache/bazel/_bazel_web_server/7039d45003118564d66f2b06f1b7ea68/external/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/BUILD:4855:1: C++ compilation of rule '@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/python:framework/fast_tensor_util.so' failed (Exit 1)
bazel-out/k8-opt/genfiles/external/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/framework/fast_tensor_util.cpp:4:20: fatal error: Python.h: No such file or directory
 #include "Python.h"
                    ^
compilation terminated.
INFO: Elapsed time: 17.580s, Critical Path: 12.44s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully

Even after setting the path to Python.h, the error still exists.

$ echo $PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH
/home/web_server/dlpy72/py2.7/include/python2.7
$ ls $PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH | grep Python
Python-ast.h
Python.h

Solved by setting the real path instead of soft link.

body:
@Michael-Jing 
I encountered the same issue when compiling the tensorflow-serving 1.7.
```
ERROR: /home/web_server/.cache/bazel/_bazel_web_server/7039d45003118564d66f2b06f1b7ea68/external/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/BUILD:4855:1: C++ compilation of rule '@org_tensorflow//tensorflow/python:framework/fast_tensor_util.so' failed (Exit 1)
bazel-out/k8-opt/genfiles/external/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/python/framework/fast_tensor_util.cpp:4:20: fatal error: Python.h: No such file or directory
 #include "Python.h"
                    ^
compilation terminated.
INFO: Elapsed time: 17.580s, Critical Path: 12.44s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully
```
Even after setting the path to Python.h, the error still exists.
```
$ echo $PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH
/home/web_server/dlpy72/py2.7/include/python2.7
$ ls $PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH | grep Python
Python-ast.h
Python.h
```
---------------------
Solved by setting the real path instead of soft link.
